history.proof: intros H. injection H as H1 H2 H3 H4. apply H3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
R: Type
Rone: R
Rzero: R
Rminus: R -> R -> R
Rmult: R -> R -> R
Rplus: R -> R -> R
Ropp: R -> R
R_is_ring: ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq
d2: R
c2: R
b2: R
a2: R
d1: R
c1: R
b1: R
a1: R

Goal:
(a1, b1, c1, d1) = (a2, b2, c2, d2) -> c1 = c2

Premises:
Notation o := Rone
ring_theory : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> Prop
Inductive eq (A : Type) (x : A) : A -> Prop := eq_refl : x = x Arguments eq {A}%type_scope Arguments eq_refl {A}%type_scope {x}, [A] _
Notation z := Rzero
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (vw : VectorDef.t ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v w where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq a1 : R b1 : R c1 : R d1 : R a2 : R b2 : R c2 : R d2 : R |- Type] ?n : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R ->...-> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq a1 : R b1 : R c1 : R d1 : R a2 : R b2 : R c2 : R d2 : R |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (a : ?A), VectorDef.cons ?A a (?n + ?m) (VectorDef.append v w) = VectorDef.append (VectorDef.cons ?A a ?n v) w where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq a1 : R b1 : R c1 : R d1 : R a2 : R b2 : R c2 : R d2 : R |- Type] ?n : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R ->...-> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq a1 : R b1 : R c1 : R d1 : R a2 : R b2 : R c2 : R d2 : R |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq a1 : R b1 : R c1 : R d1 : R a2 : R b2 : R c2 : R d2 : R |- Type] ?n : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq a1 : R b1 : R c1 : R d1 : R a2 : R b2 : R c2 : R d2 : R |- nat]
VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (l + r) -> VectorDef.t ?A l * VectorDef.t ?A r where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq a1 : R b1 : R c1 : R d1 : R a2 : R b2 : R c2 : R d2 : R |- Type]
Rring_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list R) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr Z), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l pe2
Rmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
Radd_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)
Rdistr_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x z) (rmul y z))
ARadd_assoc1 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd (radd x y) z) (radd (radd y z) x)
rsub_ext4_Proper : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req req)) rsub
ARadd_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)
mk_rt : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), (forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x) -> (forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)) -> (forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x) -> (forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x z) (rmul y z))) ->...-> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req
Rth_ARth : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req
Rmul_1_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x
Radd_0_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x
Ropp_opp : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (ropp (ropp x)) x
Rmul_0_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO
Ropp_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (radd x (ropp x)) rO
Rmul_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)
Radd_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)
RingMicromega.eval_nformula : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> RingMicromega.PolEnv R -> RingMicromega.NFormula C -> Prop
rsub_ext4 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req x y -> forall x0 y0 : R, req x0 y0 -> req (rsub x x0) (rsub y y0)
Rsub_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rsub x y) (radd x (ropp y))
RingMicromega.eval_op1 : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> RingMicromega.Op1 -> R -> Prop
gen_phiZ : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> Z -> R
gen_phiZ1 : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> Z -> R
Ropp_mul_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (ropp (rmul x y)) (rmul (ropp x) y)
Field_theory.mk_field : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> ~ req rI rO -> (forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q))) -> (forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI) -> Field_theory.field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req
Ropp_add : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (ropp (radd x y)) (radd (ropp x) (ropp y))
same_genZ : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : Z, req (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp x) (gen_phiZ1 rO rI radd rmul ropp x)
gen_phiZ_morph : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp)
gen_phiPOS : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> positive -> R
gen_phiPOS1 : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> positive -> R
pow_N : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> R -> N -> R
RingMicromega.eval_pol : forall R : Type, (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> RingMicromega.PolEnv R -> RingMicromega.PolC C -> R
gen_phiZ1_pos_sub : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : positive, req (gen_phiZ1 rO rI radd rmul ropp (Z.pos_sub x y)) (radd (gen_phiPOS1 rI radd rmul x) (ropp (gen_phiPOS1 rI radd rmul y)))
Smorph_opp : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceq : C -> C -> Prop) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), ring_theory cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceq -> semi_morph rO rI radd rmul req cO cI cadd cmul ceqb phi -> (forall x y : C, ceq x y -> req (phi x) (phi y)) -> forall x : C, req (phi (copp x)) (ropp (phi x))
Smorph_sub : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceq : C -> C -> Prop) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), ring_theory cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceq -> semi_morph rO rI radd rmul req cO cI cadd cmul ceqb phi -> (forall x y : C, ceq x y -> req (phi x) (phi y)) -> forall x y : C, req (phi (csub x y)) (rsub (phi x) (phi y))
gen_phiZ_add : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : Z, req (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp (x + y)) (radd (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp x) (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp y))
gen_phiZ_mul : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : Z, req (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp (x * y)) (rmul (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp x) (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp y))
